nodes.text: Bresallis was a planet located within the Bresallis system, which was located in the Cadma sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It was plagued by a criminal underworld run by the Hutts. Ambassador Walads opposed the Hutts, trying to disrupt their businesses. He was about to make a speech to the government on the subject when the Hutts hired Brahle Logris to assassinate him.
